snippet.title: 【ゲンバの絆】 GENBA no Kizuna - Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is the 1st trailer for our dinosaur-themed murder mystery visual novel!
More information on it can be found in the following places:

- Official Website: http://gosatsu.com/genba/
- Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/937280
- Itch Store Page: https://gosatsuvns.itch.io/genba
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/GosatsuVNs
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/gAp52K3

If our project strikes your curiosity, be sure to add it to your wishlists!

Also, if you want to get an even better impression of what it's going to be like, don't forget that there's a demo available over on itch, containing the prologue and a good chunk of the 1st chapter. Patrons can even check out more of the game beyond that and help us polish and improve it through beta-testing: https://www.patreon.com/gosatsuvns
